changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(250), last_name VARCHAR(250), CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE game ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, game_status_id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, rows INT NOT NULL, colums INT NOT NULL, mines INT NOT NULL, pause BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 , game_start_date DateTime, last_restart_date DateTime, last_move_date DateTime, game_time BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_game_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE CONSTRAINT fk_game_gamestatus FOREIGN KEY (game_status_id) REFERENCES game_status(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE cell ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, game_id BIGINT NOT NULL, x_position INT NOT NULL, y_position INT NOT NULL, mine BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 , flag BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, revealed BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, value INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_cell_game FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES game(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
